name: Secret Vision (requires some red glasses)
description:
This is a remake of Melanie Hoffs "DECODELIA" ( http://www.artdelicorp.com/2016/03/01/decodelia/ )
It allows to hide what's on your screen from everyone except you with your red glasses (like one eye of these old school 3D-glasses).

Firefox only, breaks when iframes appear.
css:
/*****************************************
REMOVED DUE TO STYLISH PRIVACY INVASION 
more info here: https://www.theregister.co.uk/2018/07/05/browsers_pull_stylish_but_invasive_browser_extension/

My styles will probably soon be available here: https://openusercss.org/profile/5b3e81947d90940b00ad06a4
